```{r}
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
population_ages <- read_csv(here("data/clean/population_ages_hb.csv"))
activity_hb <- read_csv(here("data/clean/activity_hb.csv"))
mortality_hb <- read_csv(here("data/clean/mortality_hb.csv"))
```

```{r}
activity_scotland <- activity_hb %>%
    filter(hb_name == "Scotland"
           & !age_group %in% c("All", "under75 years") 
           & sex != "All"
           & year == "2018"
           & diagnosis == "Stroke"
           & admission_type == "All"
         ) 
```

```{r}
mortality_scotland <- mortality_hb %>% 
  filter(hb_name == "Scotland" 
           & !age_group %in% c("All", "under75 years") 
           & sex != "All"
           & year == "2018"
           & diagnosis == "Stroke")
```

```{r}
population_scotland <- population_ages %>% 
  filter(hb_name == "Scotland" & sex != "All") %>% 
  group_by(year, sex, age_band2) %>% 
  summarise(population = sum(count))

```
